meanings.sent1: She misbuttoned her coat and had to redo it.
meanings.sent2: He always misbuttoned his shirt in a rush.
meanings.sent3: The cat misbuttoned the toy mouse onto its tail.
meanings.sent4: The misbuttoned puzzle pieces didn't fit together.
meanings.sent5: Misbuttoned clothes can be uncomfortable to wear.

meanings.sent1: She wore a misbuttoned cardigan to the party.
meanings.sent2: The misbuttoned jacket looked crooked on him.
meanings.sent3: The misbuttoned pillowcase made the pillow lumpy.
meanings.sent4: The misbuttoned curtains let in too much light.
meanings.sent5: His misbuttoned pants kept falling down.
